prompt: Go to Gmail. Compose an email to client@company.com with the subject 'Welcome and Important Resources'. Include the following links with descriptions: our company website (https://www.ourcompany.com) described as 'Our official website with company information', our support documentation (https://support.ourcompany.com) described as 'Technical guides and FAQs', and our scheduling page (https://calendar.ourcompany.com/book) described as 'Book a meeting with our team'.
expected_behaviour: The agent should open Gmail, create a new email with the specified recipient and subject line, and compose a welcoming message that includes: three properly functioning hyperlinks to the specified websites, the provided descriptive text before each link, and links should be embedded in text rather than showing as raw URLs.
